#How to install Google App in Eclipse 3.5 (Galileo)

Add your content here.  Format your content with:
  * Go to Help -> Install New Software
  * Enter http://dl.google.com/eclipse/plugin/3.5 in Work with box
  * Click Add and then click OK (leave the name blank)
  * Tick all boxes before "Plugin" and "SDKs"
  * Click Next and follow the prompts to install
  * Restart Ecipse
